fields.description:
* create role
* delete role
* roles landing page
* role detail page
* add role when launching instance or creating launch config
* add role as a filter for the instance landing page
* show role attached to instance on instance detail page

comments.body:
After initial review of roles branch, there are a few small things still to-do or that need addressing:

* Add role selector to filters for instance landing page (done, but shows all roles)
* Show instances using a role on role landing and detail page (done)
* disable Save Changes button on role detail page until path is changed (no longer needed, see comment in GUI-1109)
* button text on Create Role should be title case (fixed and pushed to feature branch by [~jloza])
* role name on role detail page should not be editable, should just be plain text field (done)
* Policy references on landing page should be "permissions" for consistency (fixed and pushed to feature branch by [~jloza])
* Need way to specify if role is EC2 or cross-account in create role, and on detail page (part of policy. create role very limited: http://docs.aws.amazon.com/IAM/latest/APIReference/API_CreateRole.html)
* Include instance profile ARN in detail page when one exists (may be multiples.. need to address this)

I've pushed code that makes all of this work, AFAIK. Probably some pretty tweaks, but I think it is fully functional now. I'll go re-work when the instance profile is created, but that won't affect your UX review.

Nice job, [~dkavanagh]! Comments:

* I still don't see instances using the role on the landing page or the detail page, but you said you did that?
* column header on landing page should be Name not Role Name (fixed and pushed to feature branch by [~jloza])
* unable to click create role button from landing page, I get a waitress error now 


I updated the role detail wireframe to support multiple instance profile ARNs :)
I fixed create-role which was broken from both entry points. To see instances, try acct 00/admin and the "WebServer" role.

Awesome job! A few things to polish to perfection: :)

Create role:
* The name field validation error should include the text "and cannot contain spaces" please (done)
* needs another space between the text entry field labels and associated text entry field (done)
* path label needs to be aligned with associated field (it's too high up now) (currently wrong on other iam pages as well) (done, and for group create as well)
* a little less space between radio buttons and their labels please (see image detail page for example of good spacing) (done)
* name and path text entry fields are too wide, should align on the right margin with fields under cross-account access radio button please (narrowed the fields. not sure about lining up with radio button labels)
* required fields key on the bottom should be aligned with cancel text. It's too high now.  (moved this above the button to be consistent with group and user pages)

Landing page: Still not seeing instance using role. See https://eucalyptus.atlassian.net/wiki/display/3UD/Roles+Landing+Page for details (done)

Role details:
* "define who can assume this role" text has wrong styling class. see image detail page sharing text for right styling (done)
* need a little padding between that text and the edit trust policy button. You can probably add padding to the top of the button to bring it down, maybe? (done)
* Add Access Policy button needs the word "Access" added, and the "role policies" text in that section should be removed, it's not needed.  (this button is used for all pages where we support policies. I'll add "Access" to the button, but know that it will appear on the user and group detail pages as well)
in develop because I'm a loser. Looks much better though!
* roles landing page isn't loading. I get part and then the working indicator
Would like to get this merged.. tests passed last week. A couple of clean-up tasks can wait till later.. pass issue back to me after merge. Thanks!
What were we waiting on here? Don't see any code to be merged, so I think this is good to go to QA.
passed UX review, assigning to Kamal for code review
I didn't see a role option under the filter menu.  I attached a screenshot of the filter options that were available.
